title: fix: image model optimizations for stability and quality
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Optimized Flux Klein, Sana, and Twinflow models to enhance stability, visual quality, and generation speed.
gist.impact: Users will see significantly fewer generation failures and improved output quality across these image models.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic fine-tuning a large, glowing pixelated camera lens. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. The camera is emitting a soft, stable light. Nostalgic but beautiful.
